plugins.name: Stremio AniSkip
plugins.author: REVENGE977
plugins.description: A plugin that integrates the AniSkip API into Stremio to automatically skip openings and endings when watching anime.

plugins.name: Slash to Search
plugins.author: REVENGE977
plugins.description: A simple plugin that allows you to search for movies, series, and anime by typing a slash (/) in the search bar.

plugins.name: FilterStreams
plugins.author: 0xA18
plugins.description: Filters a movie's/tv show episode's streams

themes.name: Amoled Dark
themes.author: REVENGE977
themes.description: A pitch black theme for stremio-enhanced
